text: Viva Maria! is a 1965 French Italian adventure comedy movie directed by Louis Malle and starring George Hamilton, Jeanne Moreau, Brigitte Bardot, Adriana Roel, Claudio Brook, Paulette Dubost, Gregor von Rezzori. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1965 adventure movies Category:1965 comedy movies Category:French adventure movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian adventure movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Movies directed by Louis Malle Category:Movies set in Central America
title: Viva Maria!
